test.name: To check the help message using --h command

kw.name: Run
kw.msg:
${result} = usage: calculator.py [-h] [--operation {add,subtract,multiply,divide}] num1 num2
Simple command-line calculator
positional arguments: num1 First number num2...
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.
